channel.title: How do I add Commands?

item.title: How do I add Commands?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

With a compiler?

@echo off
title Compiler
javac *.java
pause

Post that into notepad and save it as compiler.bat

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add Commands?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("money")) { addItem(995, 999999999); }

When you add that make sure to compile and reset the server, than it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add Commands?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hello everyone, I’m making a new server and used King-Isle Source 2. I’m making a 317 and just can’t seem to make a new command. For example: I want to add a money command which automatically gives you 999m cash so i do this:

if(command.startsWith(“money”){
addItem(0995, 999);
}

When I save and close it, I try it on the server, I even made myself an owner to do this, but nothing happens. :mad:
Please help!

Read full topic
